sentence.Network_en: Righteousness and justice are the foundation of Your throne; Lovingkindness and truth go before Your face.
sentence.Network_cn: 公义和公平,是你宝座的根基; 慈爱和真实,行在你面前.

sentence.Network_en: But I will not break off My lovingkindness from him , Nor deal falsely in My faithfulness.
sentence.Network_cn: 诗89:33只是我必不将我的慈爱、然收回 、 必不叫我的信实废弃.

sentence.Network_en: Your lovingkindness, O Lord, extends to the heavens, Your faithfulness reaches to the skies.
sentence.Network_cn: 诗36:5耶和华阿 、 的慈爱 、 及诸天.的信实、到穹苍.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 进食一些英语单词-中国儿童网 ...lovingkindness慈爱；爱护disingenuous不真诚的
my lovingkindness and my fortress , My stronghold and my deliverer , My shield and He in whom I take refuge , Who subdues my people under me .他是我慈爱的主，我的山寨，我的高台，我的救主，我的盾牌，是我所投靠的。他使我的百姓服在我以下。

list.abs: Hear my voice according to Your lovingkindness ; Revive me , O LORD , according to Your ordinances ., 求你照你的慈爱听我的声音 . 耶和华阿 , 求你照你的典章 , 将我救活.
The earth is full of Your lovingkindness , O LORD ; Teach me Your statutes ., 耶和华阿 , 你的慈爱遍满大地 . 求你将你的律例教训我.
